content.rendered:
Personalised Digital Lenses for Precise Vision

Personage is a hi-tech lens in single vision that considers the position of wear to deliver a personalised lens that minimises oblique astigmatism. Its unique Ultra Thin optimisation technology creates a brilliant combination of optics and aesthetics

Personage is available with a range of top of the line Lustraa
coating offerings. Choose the Lustraa coating that best serves your need
and keep enhancing the level of protection for your precious lenses.

HD • UV+ • Blue+ • IR+ • DrivEase • FogFree


Features



  • Crafted with utmost precision as per prescription
  • Highest visual perception in all gaze direction
  • Minimum oblique astigmatism
  • Personalised lens with ergonomic design
  • Optics & aesthetics best combined
  • Ideal for active and modern lifestyles
  • Suitable for a wide range of frames
  • Option of 6 Lustraa coatings



Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses
